name: Magnolia's Wish
description:
A short point and click game where you help take care of your friend Rose's mother during Christmas Eve. Explore her homely abode and bake some (oatmeal, prune, and raisin) cookies!

Inspired by family, Discworld, classic point and click games, and The Caretaker.

Featuring:

  • Puzzles that span the household.
  • An in-game hint system (by granny herself)
  • Custom 2d illustrations.
  • A minimalist UI.

Coding: Patrick Mogianesi, Mel Ho, Braxton DeHate

Art : Alessa Mogianesi

Music: Todd Nabonne
Sound Effects: Braxton DeHate

Made with Love2D, using the hump, suit, and rxi/classic libraries.

Code Repository: https://github.com/Pmogi/Christmas_Jam
